name: afew
description:
afew is a very chaotic and fast paced platformer game created in one week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

The Game

In afew, you play as a Cube that got stuck in a time loop. Every time you complete the level, a ghost of your past self will replay the level aswell.
Like in a racing game... but in this game, you can interact and collide with them.

After every time you reached the ending, a new ghost will appear and will interfere with you!

Controls

Move: A / S / Arrow Left / Arrow Right

Jump: W / Space

Dash: Leftclick ( Dash into Mouse Direction )

Discord Server

If you have questions or want to suggest new features, join my discord server:

https://discord.gg/BG5QvK6GNz

Credits
  • Programming and Game Design by tiimo
  • Art by tiimo and draven (https://www.instagram.com/drr4v3n/)
  • Music by Yuriy Tsymbaliuk (on youtube)
